dcterms:description: The LRE Map of Language Resources is an innovative instrument aimed at monitoring and representing the wealth of data and technologies developed and used in the field of Natural Language Processing (NLP). It provides a comprehensive overview of language resources and their usage.
dcterms:title: LRE Map of Language Resources

dcterms:creator: R. Del Gratta
G. Pardelli
S. Goggi
dcterms:description: The LRE Map data provides insights into the creation and use of Language Resources, collected from various conferences. It includes metadata about approximately 7500 resources, analyzing trends and comparisons between major conferences.
dcterms:title: LRE Map data

dcterms:creator: N. Calzolari
C. Soria
R. Del Gratta
S. Goggi
V. Quochi
I. Russo
K. Choukri
J. Mariani
S. Piperidis
dcterms:description: The LRE Map is a comprehensive resource that documents various Language Resources, facilitating better understanding and usage in the NLP community.
dcterms:title: Language Resources (LRs)
